error.description: Error returned from the API request

bucket.description: Start time of the candle interval

close.description: Price at the end of the interval (in satoshis)

high.description: Highest price during the interval (in satoshis)

low.description: Lowest price during the interval (in satoshis)

open.description: Price at the start of the interval (in satoshis)

symbol.description: Symbol of the Rune asset trading pair (BTC-Rune ID)

volume.description: Total traded amount during the interval. Volume=0 for backfilled, synthetic candles (queried with carry=true)

etched_tx_hash.description: Transaction hash where the Rune was etched

rune_id.description: Symbol of the Rune asset trading pair (BTC-Rune ID)

spacer.description: Spacer value associated with the Rune

block.description: Block height where the trade was included

symbol.description: Symbol of the Rune asset trading pair (BTC-Rune ID)

timestamp.description: Time of the block in which trade occurred

tx_index.description: Index of the trade within the block, 0-based (first trade is 0, second trade is 1, not transaction index)

info.description:
This API delivers real-time, rollback-protected DEX pricing data with deep network-level indexing that abstracts away complex trade and UTXO handling—giving developers the power of resilient, trustworthy market data without building their own infrastructure.
#### Key Features:
- **Mempool Awareness:** Provides insight into the latest trades from the mempool for the most dynamic price discovery.
- **Rollback Protection:** Ensures price accuracy by tracking chain reorganizations and updating data accordingly—no stale or orphaned block data.
- **Dual-Pipeline Indexing:** Separately indexes UTXOs and trades for accuracy and real-time responsiveness.
- **Real-Time Price Feeds:** Continuously updated trade and price data, optimized for wallets, traders, and analytics platforms.

#### Key Benefits for Developers:
- Track accurate, chain-verified prices without maintaining your own indexers.
- Build DEX-integrated wallets and apps with reliable, real-time market signals.
- Identify and act on price trends immediately, with confidence the data won’t be invalidated by reorgs.
info.title: Bitcoin - Market Price API

get.description: Retrieves a list of all decentralized exchanges (DEXs) currently indexed and supported by the API. This serves as the discovery endpoint for clients to programmatically identify valid DEX identifiers used in other endpoints like trades or OHLC queries.

Returns candlestick-formatted market data (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) for a specific DEX and Rune pair, segmented by time intervals. This is ideal for price charting, trend analysis, and historical performance. Data is sourced from both confirmed blocks and optionally from the mempool, depending on configuration.

parameters.description: Symbol of the Rune asset trading pair (BTC-Rune ID)
parameters.name: symbol

parameters.description: Limit number of Runes returned (min: 1, max: 50000)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Fill candles with no trades with synthetic data (OHLC filled with previous closing price, volume=0)
parameters.name: carry

get.description: Provides a time-series list of individual trades for a specified Rune pair on a given DEX, including granular data such as trade price (in satoshis), volume, block height, and buy/sell direction. Especially useful for high-frequency strategies or price feed services.

parameters.description: Symbol of the Rune asset trading pair (BTC-Rune ID)
parameters.name: symbol

parameters.description: Limit number of Runes returned (min: 1, max: 50000)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Returns metadata for Rune assets registered and etched into the Bitcoin blockchain. This includes human-readable name, symbol, divisibility (decimals), and genesis transaction. Filtering by `rune_id` narrows the query to a specific asset.

parameters.description: Limit number of Runes returned (min: 1, max: 50000)
parameters.name: limit
